name: Lotus Silk Cloudtreaders (Wukong's Fake Armor)
description: Unmissable, story-related. Automatically earned in Chapter 6.

name: Bull King's Greaves
description: Can be crafted after defeating Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast at the end of Chapter 5's secret area. Requires Bull King's Iron Horns dropped by this boss (must beat it again in NG+ to craft full set). Another horn is found in chest in Chapter 5 Secret Area so be sure to grab this too. In order to craft the full set you will need New Game+ to get enough materials.

name: Pilgrim's Legwraps
description: Can be crafted upon reaching the "Guanine Temple Shrine" in Chapter 1.

name: Yaksha Greaves of Outrage
description: Can be crafted after reaching the first Shrine in Chapter 6.

name: Iron-Tough Greaves
description: Can be crafted after challenging and defeating the Yin Tiger blacksmith in Zodiac Village. Must have done Chen Loong questline to reach Zodiac Village.

name: Centipede Greaves of Transcendence
description: Can be crafted after reaching the first Shrine in Chapter 5.

name: Non-Pure Greaves
description: Can be crafted after defeating Zhu Bajie boss in Chapter 4.

name: Golden Greaves
description: Can be crafted after reaching the first Shrine in Chapter 4.

name: Insect Spike Greaves
description: Can be crafted after defeating Fuban boss in Chapter 2 Secret Area.

name: Loongscale Greaves
description: Can be crafted after defeating Kang-Jin Star boss in Chapter 3's Turtle Island.

name: Ochre Greaves
description: Can be crafted after reaching the first Shrine in Chapter 3.

name: Folk Opera Buskins
description: Exclusive to the Deluxe Edition of the game. If owned, it can be crafted at the first Shrine of the game. Not necessary for the trophy.

name: Galeguard Grevaes
description: Can be crafted after defeating the Stone Vanguard boss in Chapter 2.

name: Ebongold Gaiters
description: Can be crafted when reaching the first Shrine in Chapter 2.

name: Bronze Buskins
description: Can be crafted after defeating Elder Jinchi boss in Chapter 1 Secret area.

name: Serpentscale Gaiters
description: Can be crafted after defeating White Clad Noble in Chapter 1.

name: Lotus Silk Cloudtreaders (Wukong's True Armor)
description: Chapter 6 > Foothills > Verdant Path. From the Shrine, turn left 90Â° and you'll see a mountain at the end of the path. Fly on the cloud, land on this mountain to find a small golden chest that contains this secret armor set.

name: Cotton Legwraps
description: You start the game with this armor piece.

name: Buskins of Opulence
description: Claimable from the Keeper's Shrine after updating to version 1.0.13.16669.
